name: Sign Up & Login
options: Users can create an account using 1 of 1 or 1 of 2 of methods possible: Facebook, Amazon, Twitter, Google, Email Address, Username, Phone Number (extra charges for sms verification).

name: Checkout
options: Customers can checkout their baskets securely. With SSL and Braintree Payments's hosted fields, your website is compliant with the 'PCI DSS Self-Assessment Questionnaire A (SAQ A)'.

name: View Receipts & Orders
options: Account holders can sign-in to view receipts for purchases they made on your website; as well as the status of their orders - from placement to fulfilment.

name: Save & Edit Delivery Details
options: Regular customers will benefit from an option that eases the checkout flow.

name: Contact form
options: Users can reach you without leaving your site.
